name: Picture Perfect v0.8
description:
THE STORY
You are a photographer dad who is close with your three daughters. There's 18 year-old Miracle who is so shy and introverted she won't leave the house without you., 20 year-old Sasha who dreams of starring on Broadway. And 22 year-old Paris who dropped out of college to mooch off you once more. Ever since the girls' mother abandoned you and them several years ago, you've had a tough time managing everything, to say the least.

You're in danger of losing the house, though you keep it a secret from the trio of girls. Now it's your job to help our protagonist change his desolate fate! You'll help him make choices and hopefully have a little fun along the way =]

THE GAME PLAY
In Picture Perfect, you play as the main character and take control of all the decision-making, such as deciding to be stricter on a character or be more understanding.

You have full control of how yo play, and which characters you'll be spending time with, without penalty. But be careful! Rejecting to spend time with a character may disable you from their route, and all future content with them.

FEATURES
- Name your own characters
- Define the relationship within the game
- Select choices that shape the story you want
- Replay the game and choose different choices to access all content
- Colorful collection of music while you play

THE DEVELOPMENT
Picture Perfect v0.8 contains the first 8 updates (demo included) of the game. The final version which will be released in 6 months or so will have 13 updates in all! (5 more updates added)!
